creator: mhaavald@online.no
text:
NONE
=====
Code not assigned a category sends all logging to appender, regardless level.

Only way to turn it "off" is to assign e.g. FATAL...

A default NONE level should be implicitly assigned all code logging...and 
having "properties" override the default value.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
This seems more like a support request than a bug report. By the way, log4j 1.2
add the OFF level which may be what you are looking for.
